```js
class RadioExample extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props);
    this.state = { radios: ["1", "2", "3"], value: "1" };
  }

  render() {
    return (
      <React.Fragment>
        {this.state.radios.map(r => (
          <FormField key={r} id={`radio-${r}`}>
            <Radio
              checked={this.state.value === r}
              onChange={() => this.setState({ value: r })}
            />
            <label>{r}</label>
          </FormField>
        ))}

        <p>Selected: {this.state.value}</p>
      </React.Fragment>
    );
  }
}

<RadioExample />;
```
